casebody.data:
DALE Patrick Martin
v.
Mike SLAGLE (Supt.) No. 210P16-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Michael T. Wood, Daniel P. O'Brien,, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Dale P. Martin, for Martin, Dale Patrick.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 7th of November 2018 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Forsyth County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
